generic <typename TInput, typename TEmbedding> where TEmbedding : Embeddingpublic ref class OpenTelemetryEmbeddingGenerator sealed : Microsoft::Extensions::AI::DelegatingEmbeddingGenerator<TInput, TEmbedding>

Docs.typeparam: The type of input used to produce embeddings.
Docs.summary: A delegating embedding generator that implements the OpenTelemetry Semantic Conventions for Generative AI systems.
Docs.remarks: The draft specification this follows is available at https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/gen-ai/. The specification is still experimental and subject to change; as such, the telemetry output by this generator is also subject to change.
